name: matched-devices

mkey.description: FortiSwitch ID. Will return all devices if no ID is provided.

include_dynamic.description: If true, include devices that match dynamic port policies. Default value is false.

GET.summary:
Return a list of devices that match NAC and/or dynamic port policies.
Access Group: wifi

help: Return a list of devices that match NAC and/or dynamic port policies.

mac.name: mac
mac.title: MAC
mac.description: The MAC address of the device.

last_known_switch.name: last_known_switch
last_known_switch.title: Last Known Switch
last_known_switch.description: The last known switch the device was connected to.

last_known_port.name: last_known_port
last_known_port.title: Last Known Port
last_known_port.description: The last known port the device was connected to.

matched_nac_policy.name: matched_nac_policy
matched_nac_policy.title: Matched NAC Policy
matched_nac_policy.description: The NAC policy that matches the device.

matched_dynamic_port_policy.name: matched_dynamic_port_policy
matched_dynamic_port_policy.title: Matched Dynamic Port Policy
matched_dynamic_port_policy.description: Matched dynamic port policy that matches the devices.

mac_policy.name: mac_policy
mac_policy.title: MAC Policy
mac_policy.description: MAC policy that matches the device.

matched_policy.name: matched_policy
matched_policy.title: Matched Policy
matched_policy.description: Policy that matches the device for dynamic port policy.

is_dynamic.name: is_dynamic
is_dynamic.title: Dynamic Port Policy
is_dynamic.description: True if this is a device that matches a dynamic port policy.

is_nac.name: is_nac
is_nac.title: NAC Policy
is_nac.description: True if this is a device that matches a NAC policy.

response_description: List devices that match NAC and dynamic port policy.

mkey.name: mkey
mkey.summary: FortiSwitch ID. Will return all devices if no ID is provided.

include_dynamic.name: include_dynamic
include_dynamic.summary: If true, include devices that match dynamic port policies. Default value is false.
